ComicInfo.Penciller: Angelo Decesare,George Wildman,Howard Post,Jacqueline Roettcher,Warren Kremer,Warren Kremer
ComicInfo.Inker: Angelo Decesare,Jacqueline Roettcher,Roberta Edelman,Ruth Leon,Jacqueline Roettcher
ComicInfo.Title: It’s All Your Vault; That Old Cat Magic!; Tuna Helper; Cat and the Beanstalk; Beach Party Massacre; Heathcliff Meets the Swamp Beast; It’s in the Bag; Bungle in the Jungle!, Introducing Marzipan the Jungle Man!
ComicInfo.Summary:
It’s All Your Vault: Heathcliff keeps his string collection in a bank vault.
That Old Cat Magic!: Heathcliff and the kids attend a magic show, but the magician is a hypnotist and a crook.
Tuna Helper: Heathcliff hooks a giant tuna.
Cat and the Beanstalk: Marcy tells Heathcliff a version of "Jack and the Beanstalk."
Beach Party Massacre: Heathcliff causes havoc at the beach.
Heathcliff Meets the Swamp Beast: The Nutmegs and Heathcliff stay at a hotel near a swamp. The legend of a swamp beast turns out to be true.
It’s in the Bag: After failing to master a heavy boxing bag, Heathcliff removes his gloves and destroys it with his claws.
Bungle in the Jungle!, Introducing Marzipan the Jungle Man!: Heathcliff jumps off a cruise ship to answer the call of Marzipan the Jungle Man, who is the protector of the treasure of the Jade Jungle. Iggy follows, but gets captured by two crooks who have stolen the treasure.
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
